程序包 data

类 Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Student
  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    The Student class models a student in the online classroom. A student will have a list of the submissions that they have made to all classrooms. A student will be able to make submissions to a classroom.
    作者:
    Kaz Nakao

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Student()
      No args Constructor.
      Student​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String idnum)
      Creates a new student

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法

      Adds a new submission to the list of submissions that the student has
      void add​(java.lang.String submissionName, java.lang.String submission, int rubric)
      Adds a new submission for the student

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Student

        public Student()
        No args Constructor. The submissions for the student will be set to an empty list and the name and id will be set to an empty string.

      • Student

        public Student​(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String idnum)
        Creates a new student
        参数:
        username - Name of the student
        idnum - ID number of the student

    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        public void add​(java.lang.String submissionName,
                java.lang.String submission,
                int rubric)
        Adds a new submission for the student
        参数:
        submissionName - The name of the new submission being created
        submission - The content that will be inside the submission
        rubric - The index of the rubric corresponding to the assignment

      • add

        public void add​(Submission s)
        Adds a new submission to the list of submissions that the student has
        参数:
        s - The submission object that you want to add

      • getSubmissions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Submission> getSubmissions()
        返回:
        An ArrayList of the submissions that the student has

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        返回:
        The name of the student

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        返回:
        The id number of the student as a String

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        覆盖:
        equals 在类中 java.lang.Object

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
